name: sea monkey baby hat
notes:
this cheeky little hat is adored by babies and their parents, too! using a ball of dishcloth cotton is economical, machine washable and the fibre is gentle on babyâ€™s noggin. plus, the little ears are just so darn cute! 

this hat is knit from the bottom to the crown with a worsted weight cotton. the top seam is either sewn up or grafted together. the ears are formed with the corners and cinched into shape. this hat has three sizes and no visible seam (there is a slightly visible seam on the garter style brim). 

**skill level:** **rookie**-apprentice-virtuoso-genius

**skills:** knit and purl 

**other materials:** tapestry needle; stitch marker
